org.eclipse.scada.da.server.browser.common

Class FolderCommon

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.scada.da.server.browser.common.FolderCommon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Folder

    public class FolderCommon
extends java.lang.Object
implements Folder
    A common folder implementation which can be used to easily implement folders.
